categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems star systems

nodes.text: The Rogue Antar system was a star system located within the Steniplis sector of the far Outer Rim that contained the Black Stall Station. The hyperspace coordinates were 673117-7rb71, as indicated by bounty hunter Cad Bane during the Clone Wars. It was supposedly where captured Force-sensitive children were being held, but in reality was a trap set by the Separatists for the Jedi.
